title: Canyon De Chelly National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park              DONATIONS Your donation will enhance park activities, help protect resources, and provide visitor services. Donations can be made in the park store or mailed to the park at: Superintendent, P.O. Box 588, Chinle, AZ 86503. Checks can be made payable to Department of the Interior-NPS with Canyon de Chelly National Monument Donation in the memo line.  We are grateful for your generosity.               VOLUNTEER Interested in volunteering and gaining real work experience at the park? Volunteers can maintain the landscape, help with custodial duties, monitor the wildlife, help visitors at the information desk or provide orientation for school groups. For more information, fill out the VIP Application and send to the Park Coordinator for review. For more volunteer opportunities with NPS, visit www.volunteer.gov/gov.               PARK STORE Purchases at the park store not only help to commemorate your visit, but support the National Parks. Find books to learn more about the park resources, postcards of your favorite spots, or even a t-shirt to share your enthusiasm. To learn more about these park stores, visit www.wnpa.org.
